agent_1.name: Aria
agent_1.lastThought: I'm in a new place! I see a bush right next to me. I should gather some resources so I can eventually build something and make sure I have food for later.

agent_2.name: Rex
agent_2.lastThought: I am Rex, and my priority is to survive and gather resources. I see several berry bushes nearby. There is one immediately to my right, and players Zara and Nova are close to my left. I will gather the bush to my right to start building my inventory.

agent_3.name: Zara
agent_3.lastThought: I see Nova and Rex nearby. I'm curious about them and this place, so I'll start by introducing myself.

lastAction.message: Hello Nova and Rex! I'm Zara. I was just about to explore these bushes; do you know if they have berries?

agent_4.name: Nova
agent_4.lastThought: I see stone to my north and bushes to my northwest. I'll move towards the stone at (14, 3) to begin gathering materials efficiently.
